author: rforrester
title: Hull transfer news: Tigers complete signing of Villarreal midfielder Alfred Nâ€™Diaye on season-long loan
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments HULL CITY have snapped up talented midfielder Alfred Nâ€™Diaye in the closing hours of transfer deadline day. 
The midfielder joins for the rest of the season on loan from La Liga side Villarreal and will wear the No.10 shirt. ðŸ“‘ | We are delighted to announce the loan signing of Alfred N'Diaye from @VillarrealCF , subject to international clearance #WelcomeAlfred pic.twitter.com/OqYv0BSuIK 
â€” Hull City (@HullCity) January 31, 2017 
It is the 26-year-oldâ€™s second stint in the Premier League having played for Sunderland in 2013. 
Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip ahead of the January window with SunSportâ€™s daily LIVE blog . 
And the Senegal international will be handed the tough task of trying to thrust Marco Silvaâ€™s side out of the relegation spot. 
The signing will be a welcome relief for Silva with Ryan Mason set for a lengthy spell on the sidelines. 
The ex-Tottenham man was forced off with a horrific broken skull following a clash of heads with Chelseaâ€™s Gary Cahill last week. 
Silva has also seen midfielders Robert Snodgrass and Jake Livermore move to West Ham and West Brom respectively. NEIL ASHTON Simon Mignolet may have stopped Chelsea running riot at the top but Blues are still in control of the title race ross-ed the plot Nottingham Forest sign Ross McCormack on loan from Aston Villa for the end of the season ho-gone Brentford 3 Aston Villa 0: Lasse Vibe's double eases Beeâ€™s pain of losing Scott Hogan to Villa BIRTHDAY IS ZO SPECIAL Cardiff 2 Preston 0: Kenneth Zohore's wonder goal on his birthday ends visitors' unbeaten run Brilliant Britt Nottingham Forest 2 Rotherham 0: A Britt Assombalonga double moves the Reds eight clear of drop zone Mark Halsey verdict Nothing wrong with David Luiz's free-kick, Liverpool and Simon Mignolet were half asleep VILLA LAND HOGAN Scott Hogan completes Â£14m move to Aston Villa after West Ham pull out of race for Brentford striker Timely Tam Bristol City 2 Sheffield Wed 2: Tammy Abraham keeps pressure off Lee Johnson with timely equaliser GUNNED DOWN Arsenal CANNOT recall Jack Wilshere from season-long loan at Bournemouth despite having NO fit midfielders Hernandez amazingly misses two penalties for Hull in their FA Cup tie with Fulham 
But N'Diaye arrives at the KC Stadium as Silva's sixth major January signing following the arrivals of Evandro, Omar Elabdellaoui, Lazar Markovic, Oumar Niasse and Andrea Ranocchia. 
And he could be thrown straight into action when Hull travel to Manchester United on Wednesday night.
